subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: With the largest margin of victory in women’s super-G since 1997, 1.32 seconds, Vonn completed a sweep of World Cup races at Lake Louise, Alberta.
snippet: With the largest margin of victory in women’s super-G since 1997, 1.32 seconds, Vonn completed a sweep of World Cup races at Lake Louise, Alberta.
